results.deck: Get your ass back to Mars in the fourth installment of the environmental destruction-focused Red Faction series. In Armageddon, players go back underground for the first time since the original Red Faction.
results.name: Red Faction: Armageddon

results.deck: The official video game based on the 2009 Hannah Montana film that allows players to control either Miley Stewart or Hannah Montana.
results.name: Hannah Montana: The Movie

results.deck: The 2009 release of the World Championship Snooker franchise featuring 32 top snooker players.
results.name: WSC Real 09: World Championship Snooker

results.deck: LEGO Rock Band is a family-friendly take on the Rock Band formula, with new songs aimed at audiences of all ages.  While the game will play similarly to other Rock Band games, it will feature LEGO characters, instruments, and venues.
results.name: LEGO Rock Band

results.deck: Atomic Games' third-person shooter, based on one of the deadliest battles in the Iraq War, has proved controversial, and is still a work in progress.
results.name: Six Days in Fallujah

results.deck: The original Trivial Pursuit board game with two new, exclusive game modes and a variety of downloadable question packs on the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
results.name: Trivial Pursuit

results.deck: A "gun battle" RPG developed at tri-Ace in collaboration with SEGA.
results.name: Resonance of Fate

results.deck: Pro Evolution Soccer 2010 is the 9th and latest game in the popular Pro Evolution Soccer series. The game is being developed and published by Konami for release on Sony's PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3 and PlayStation Portable; Microsoft's Xbox 360 and Windows; Nintendo's Wii and for Mobile Phones
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2010

results.deck: The latest entry in the Steambot Chronicles/Bumpy Trot franchise. Development originally started on PS2 but was later shifted to PS3. The game was canceled near the end of March 2011.
results.name: Poncotsu Roman Daikatsugeki Bumpy Trot 2

results.deck: The first in the series since the original PlayStation, Vandal Hearts returns for a third installment on the PlayStation Network and Xbox Live Arcade in this prequel to the original.
results.name: Vandal Hearts: Flames of Judgment

results.deck: Activision and the History Channel bring you back to the Civil War.
results.name: History Channel: Civil War - Secret Missions

results.deck: An adventure game featuring characters from multiple Tales games.
results.name: Tales of Fandom Vol. 2 Luke/Tear Version

results.deck: "Live for adrenaline" in this budget racing game released for the Xbox 360, PS3 and Wii.
results.name: Ski-Doo Snowmobile Challenge

results.deck: The post-apocalyptic Fallout universe expands into Nevada in this new title in the franchise. As a courier once left for dead by a mysterious man in a striped suit, the player must now set out to find his assailant and uncover the secrets of the enigmatic ruler of New Vegas.
results.name: Fallout: New Vegas

results.deck: Bizarre Creations' Blur mixes the driving of the Project Gotham Racing series with explosive weaponry and allows players to race up to 20 online opponents.
results.name: Blur

results.deck: Developed by Codemasters and using the Ego engine, Formula One 2010 is the first truly next generation F1 game that contains all the cars, drivers and tracks from the 2010 season, putting a heavy emphasis on simulating real life weather effects.
results.name: F1 2010

results.deck: Square Enix's turn-based mech-combat game comes to the PC, PS3, and Xbox 360 as a 3rd person shooter.
results.name: Front Mission Evolved

results.deck: This as-yet unnamed game is an interactive Fool Pitying simulation staring none other than Mr. T. It is being developed by ZootFly and will appear on Xbox 360, PS3, Wii, and PC.
results.name: Mr. T

results.deck: Future Soldier is the first in Ubisoft's long-running Ghost Recon series of tactical shooters to take place in the near-future.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier

results.deck: The Buzz franchise continues with trivia relating to The Great Southland (Australia).
results.name: Buzz: Brain of Oz

results.deck: Chaotic: Shadow Warriors is a video game based on the TV show and trading card game of the same name.
results.name: Chaotic: Shadow Warriors

results.deck: Revealed at TGS 2008, little is known about this game. It has since become vaporware.
results.name: Castlevania

results.deck: Planet 51 is a sandbox action adventure game based on the animated movie of the same name.
results.name: Planet 51

results.deck: Band Hero is a spin-off game of the Guitar Hero series by Activision released for the Xbox 360 Playstation 3, Wii and Nintendo DS.
results.name: Band Hero

results.deck: Boy meets girl. Boy is murdered by his undead stepfather. Girl uses forbidden ritual to bind her soul with his. Boy seeks revenge, girl seeks to complete quest. So goes the story of Last Rebellion, developed by Hit Maker for the PS3.
results.name: Last Rebellion

results.deck: Witches (working title) is a game developed for PS3, PC and 360 by Revistronic. It currently has no developer and the game is set to be in a fictional medieval universe.
results.name: Witches

results.deck: Star Wars: The Clone Wars -- Republic Heroes takes place during the first and second seasons of the TV cartoon Star Wars: The Clone Wars. It features the art style of the cartoon and was released on Xbox 360, Wii, PC, Nintendo DS and Playstation.
results.name: Star Wars The Clone Wars: Republic Heroes

results.deck: Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days makes a notable switch of the titular duo, with James Lynch now taking up the role as lead protagonist over Kane. However the two are still once again forced to endure a hail of gunfire as they find themselves embroiled in Shanghai's criminal underworld.
results.name: Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days

results.deck: Developed by Eidos Montréal and coming more than 10 years after the previous Thief game, this is the fourth installment in and a reboot of the Thief franchise.
results.name: Thief

results.deck: The third Cricket game by Codemasters focused mainly on the Ashes tour. Also the first ever Cricket game to be released on the Wii.
results.name: Ashes Cricket 2009

results.deck: Rock Band Country Track Pack is a standalone game that wraps up 21 country songs into one retail package.  The songs are a collection of previously released DLC, as well as new tracks that have yet to appear in any Rock Band game.
results.name: Rock Band: Country Track Pack

results.deck: Agent 47 returns after a six-year hiatus to embark on a mission of redemption for the only person he could ever trust.
results.name: Hitman: Absolution

results.deck: A visual novel originally released with adult content on the PC, before seeing released versions without such content elsewhere.
results.name: Time Leap

results.deck: The seventh installment of the long-running action franchise, Call of Duty: Black Ops puts players into the early era of the Cold War (including the Vietnam War) as a member of the United States black operations unit known as the SOG.
results.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops

results.deck: Pearl Jam Live was to be a standalone expansion pack to the Rock Band platform, featuring live concert versions of the most popular songs of Pearl Jam. It has since dissolved into vaporware, with no news of a release.
results.name: Pearl Jam Live: Rock Band

results.deck: When Earth is in its final hour before extinction from alien hordes, it's up to one man to venture through an apocalyptic near-future Egypt and begin a journey to save humanity: Sam "Serious" Stone.
results.name: Serious Sam 3: BFE

results.deck: The MX vs. ATV series returns with new gameplay additions such as terrain deformation, dual stick control, a revamped trick system, and a wreck avoidance system.
results.name: MX vs. ATV: Reflex

results.deck: The 19th installment of EA Sports' long running series, NHL 10 brings a new degree of toughness through one-on-one battle refinements and a new board physics engine, as well as various EA Sports Hockey League adjustments.
results.name: NHL 10

results.deck: The third game in the popular AvP franchise. Players are be able to control one of the three deadly species in a fight for survival.
results.name: Aliens vs. Predator

results.deck: Family friendly Lord of the Rings game focusing on Aragorn.
results.name: The Lord of the Rings: Aragorn's Quest

results.deck: Fatal Inertia is a futuristic racer from Koei for the Xbox 360. It is based in the Unreal Engine 3 and bears strong similarities to the racing series Wipeout and F-Zero
results.name: Fatal Inertia

results.deck:
Trinity Universe is a PlayStation 3 role-playing game developed by Idea Factory, Gust Corporation and Nippon Ichi Software.

Trinity Universe is in full 3D featuring dungeons, battles and two plot lines: Goddess and Devil King. Gust Corporation created the storyline for Goddess, while NIS created the Devil King story.
results.name: Trinity Universe

results.deck: Game page for a game in te Buzz! Junior series. It's a collection of Buzz minigames.
results.name: Buzz! Junior: Monster Rumble

results.deck: Dragon Ball: Raging Blast is the second Dragon Ball game to be released for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 consoles. It was developed by Spike, creators of the Budokai Tenkaichi series.
results.name: Dragon Ball: Raging Blast

results.deck: Revolution was an open-world shooter in development for PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 at THQ's Concrete Games. Development ended in January 2008 when the studio closed down.
results.name: Revolution

results.deck: Set two years before the James Cameron film of the same name, Avatar: The Game takes place on Pandora, a gas giant's moon, and pits the merciless humans against Pandora's natives, the Na'vi.
results.name: James Cameron's Avatar: The Game

results.deck: Nothing is as it seems. Nier must travel the world in search of a cure for his daughter who has been infected with the deadly "Black Scrawl" virus. How far will you go to save someone you love?
results.name: Nier

results.deck: The Lost & Damned and The Ballad of Gay Tony are collected onto this standalone disc of Grand Theft Auto IV's post-release content.
results.name: Grand Theft Auto: Episodes from Liberty City

results.deck: A massive open-world RPG where players could sail the vast seas and discover booty in the Pirates of the Caribbean universe. At least it would have been if the project hadn't been cancelled in late 2010.
results.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Armada of the Damned

results.deck: The Grinder is a 4-player survival game that is a first person shooter on the Wii and a top-down action game on the Xbox 360 and PS3. Development of this game is currently on an indefinite hiatus.
results.name: The Grinder

results.deck: By the year 2027, the North Koreans have managed to unify Korea, annex Japan, and also invade the western half of the United States. As an American rebel fighter, it is the player's duty to help push the NPA out of the United States and end the citizens' suffering.
results.name: Homefront

results.deck: The PlayStation 3 iteration in the KOEI series is set before the events of the Japanese exclusive game.
results.name: Trinity: Souls of Zill O'll

results.deck: An FPS being developed by Ubisoft. Very little is known about it besides this.
results.name: Killing Day

results.deck: Grab the mic and prove you got swagger in this hip-hop-focused music game from 4mm Games and Terminal Reality.
results.name: Def Jam Rapstar

results.deck: Join Sonic, Amigo, Ulala, and a bunch more classic Sega characters in this kart-style racing game.
results.name: Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing

results.deck: A multiplayer-focused, class-based first-person shooter in which oppressive soldiers and anarchistic terrorists battle for the few remaining resources on a failed paradise known as the Ark.
results.name: Brink

results.deck: Lego Indiana Jones 2 retells the stories from the original trilogy in new levels, as well as the story of Kingdom of the Crystal Skull. It will also have a level editor.
results.name: LEGO Indiana Jones 2: The Adventure Continues

results.deck: FIFA 10 is EA Sports' 2009-2010 edition of the successful football game franchise.
results.name: FIFA 10

results.deck: Play as a quick-witted natural disaster, and wreak havoc down below.
results.name: Tornado Outbreak

results.deck: The popular LEGO franchise adds Harry Potter to its list of conquests in this action-adventure from Warner Bros and Traveller's Tales. The game covers the first four books/movies, and Hogwarts acts as a main hub, containing many secret areas and unlockables.
results.name: LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4

results.deck: Set three years after the original Crysis, an ambushed Marine named Alcatraz dons the famous Nanosuit and fights his way through an obliterated New York City to stop the alien invasion.
results.name: Crysis 2

results.deck: A post-apocalyptic shooter from Teyon
results.name: Forsaken Patrol

results.deck: A fast-paced action game co-developed by PlatinumGames and Kojima Productions. It follows ninja-cyborg Raiden's activities several years after the events of Metal Gear Solid 4.
results.name: Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance

results.deck: Based on the popular ride at Disney Hollywood Studios.
results.name: Toy Story Mania!

results.deck: EA Sports MMA is a mixed martial arts game for the Xbox 360 and PS3, developed by EA Tiburon.
results.name: EA Sports MMA

results.deck: Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker is the latest portable entry in the Metal Gear franchise, and the second canonical Metal Gear title produced for the PSP. Set in Costa Rica, Peace Walker puts you in control of Big Boss once again as he prepares the rise of Outer Heaven.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker

results.deck: Based on the motion picture inspired by the 1963 Maurice Sendak picture book of the same name.
results.name: Where The Wild Things Are

results.deck: Summer Athletics is back with the 2009 edition
results.name: Summer Athletics 2009

results.deck: A third-person action game by Rockstar North, focused on the covert war fought by US and Soviet spies during the late '70s. Announced as a PS3 exclusive in 2009, specifics of the game have remained classified.
results.name: Agent

results.deck: The second MMO in the Final Fantasy universe. After suffering a tumultuous launch, the game was reinvisioned by a new development team, and relaunched as "A Realm Reborn" on August 27, 2013 on PS3 and PC, April 14, 2014 on PlayStation 4, and on June 23, 2015 for OS X.
results.name: Final Fantasy XIV Online: A Realm Reborn

results.deck: ModNation Racers is a racing game using Sony's "Play, Create, Share" mantra -- applied in ModNation Racers as "Race, Create, Share". Like other titles in the series such as LittleBigPlanet, it allows players to customize characters, create their own levels/tracks, and share them online on the PlayStation Network.
results.name: ModNation Racers

results.deck: Based off the Pixar film, Cars
results.name: Cars: Race-O-Rama

results.deck: Warriors: Legends of Troy is a western-developed take on Koei's Musou franchise set during the Trojan War.
results.name: Warriors: Legends of Troy

results.deck: The eleventh game of the SmackDown! games developed by Yuke's Co.
results.name: WWE SmackDown! vs. RAW 2010

results.deck: Play as six Ice Age characters as they embark on a rescue mission across melting snow to the mysterious Dinosaur World.
results.name: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs

results.deck: The second episodic Watchmen game picks up where the first one left off with the story of Night Owl and Rorschach pre-Watchmen (the film and book).
results.name: Watchmen: The End is Nigh Part 2

results.deck: NBA 2K10 is the 11th installment in the series and is to be released on October 6, 2009.
results.name: NBA 2K10

results.deck: Battlefield 3 is DICE's third numerical installment in the Battlefield franchise. It features a single player and co-operative campaign, as well as an extensive multiplayer component.
results.name: Battlefield 3

results.deck: Fireburst is an off-road action racing game featuring vehicles that burst into flames.
results.name: Fireburst

results.deck: EA's annual basketball series returns for the 2009-10 NBA season
results.name: NBA Live 10

results.deck: The newest hockey game from 2K Sports has Washington Capitals star Alexander Ovechkin as cover athlete for the 10th anniversary edition of the game.
results.name: NHL 2K10

results.deck: Necessary Force was the last title that Midway Newcastle worked on before the studio's closure on July 2009. It was set to be a Tech Noir-styled open world adventure where you played a detective who would solve crimes and generally clean up the fictional city.
results.name: Necessary Force

results.deck: Bakugan Battle Brawlers is the multi-platform video game tie-in into the popular Japanese Action adventure cartoon of the same name.  It is a thematic hybrid between a card battle cartoon (e.g., Yu-Gi-Oh) and a creature collecting/battle cartoon (e.g., Pokemon, Digimon).
results.name: Bakugan Battle Brawlers

results.deck: A belated action-adventure tie-in to the popular television show Prison Break.
results.name: Prison Break: The Conspiracy

results.deck: Record of Agarest War is a strategy role-playing game with dating sim elements.
results.name: Record of Agarest War

results.deck: The tie-in to the Steven Spielberg/Peter Jackson Tintin movie, it was developed by Ubisoft Montpellier.
results.name: The Adventures of Tintin

results.deck: Superstars V8 Racing is licensed by the Italian Championship racing league, letting you race with a variety of V8 engines. The game includes a number of important car manufacturers such as BMW, Jaguar and Audi. Everything has been designed to be as realistic as possible.
results.name: Superstars V8 Racing

results.deck: Capcom's latest game in the Sengoku Basara series, this time maintaining names and historical references.
results.name: Sengoku Basara: Samurai Heroes

results.deck: Sequel to the cult hit action RPG Two Worlds, Two worlds II takes place years after the original and follows the story of the character from the first Two Worlds as he continues his struggle to defeat Lord Gandohar.
results.name: Two Worlds II

results.deck: THQ's youth-oriented adaptation of the Disney/Pixar film of the same name.
results.name: Up

results.deck: A young and inexperienced Lara Croft is shipwrecked on a mysterious island in this reboot of the beloved action adventure franchise, departing from the mood of prior games in the series.
results.name: Tomb Raider

results.deck: A train simulator set on the Taiwan High Speed Rail line, using full 1080p HD footage of the real-world train line.
results.name: Railfan: Taiwan High Speed Rail

results.deck: Yakuza 4 is the fourth game in Sega's crime drama series, known as 'Ryu ga Gotoku' in Japan. As a first for the series, the story is split between the viewpoints of four different protagonists.
results.name: Yakuza 4

results.deck: The next instalment in the popular karaoke game series. It features songs from  the British boy band Take That.
results.name: SingStar: Take That

results.deck: A FPS that allows the user to mentally control a hovering phantom who wields multiple powers. One of the very first PS3 games shown off, no news of the game has been released since TGS 2005 , yet it hasn't been officially canceled.
results.name: Fifth Phantom Saga

results.deck: Revealed in an E3 2005 trailer, Eyedentify provided a glimpse of the future for the PlayStation Eye. The player uses the Eye to vocally guide two female agents through missions, but the game was eventually cancelled.
results.name: Eyedentify

results.deck: A port of the PSP game for HD consoles. Voice acting has been reintroduced for almost every line in the game.
results.name: Shin Sangoku Musou: Multi Raid Special

results.deck: Cabela's Big Game Hunter 2010 is the latest in the Big Game Hunter franchise.
results.name: Cabela's Big Game Hunter 2010

results.deck: A remake of the first game in the pre-eminent video game horror series, featuring a graphics overhaul, as well as several new gameplay features, environments, and unlockable modes that weren't included within the original version.
results.name: Resident Evil

results.deck: Originally shown at E3 2005's PS3 montage, the third installment of The Getaway was eventually canceled in June 2008.
results.name: The Getaway 3
